# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.avi$
\.ico$
\.html$
\.jpe?g$
\.js$
\.json$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.peg$
\.png$
\.ts.?$
\.txt$
\.sql$
\.svg$
\.wav$
^\.github/
